entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
